title: Cannot find any package installation
body:
I decided to upgrade my spack and nothing works anymore.
So, I decided to have a fresh installation and got the latest tag 0.10.0.

```
$ spack find -p 
==> 4 installed packages.
-- linux-rhel6-x86_64 / gcc@4.6.1 -------------------------------
    libffi@3.2.1       /usr/workspace/wsa/bluenet/thiago/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel6-x86_64/gcc-4.6.1/libffi-3.2.1-dtonmgxweviawxhaxh5ksuoyzjoprq7u
    ruby@2.2.0         /usr/workspace/wsa/bluenet/thiago/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel6-x86_64/gcc-4.6.1/ruby-2.2.0-qezm2l32dhzutgy7eqnfec3tk2rjkliv
    tmuxinator@0.6.11  /usr/workspace/wsa/bluenet/thiago/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel6-x86_64/gcc-4.6.1/tmuxinator-0.6.11-75czzxglwibzesozshh4tfev3v5ryrfs
    zlib@1.2.10        /usr/workspace/wsa/bluenet/thiago/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel6-x86_64/gcc-4.6.1/zlib-1.2.10-dwavb3pn4os4kosd2zneb5bpjzpkeygn
```
However, it cannot find any package install:

```
$ spack use tmuxinator
Prepending: tmuxinator-0.6.11-gcc-4.6.1-75czzxg (not found)
```
Thanks
